testimonials.name: David & Lisa
testimonials.quote: We used Fairway for our kitchen renovation. Excellent communication and quality workmanship. Will definitely use again.

testimonials.name: Mike Thompson
testimonials.quote: Prompt service when we lost power. The electrician was friendly and fixed the fault quickly. Great local service.

testimonials.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonials.quote: Fairway Electrical transformed our home lighting. Professional, tidy, and great advice on LED options. Highly recommend!
